sourcesContent:
const menu = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: 'LOADED CHAPATI COMBO',
      category: 'breakfast',
      price:31000,
      img: './images/item-1.jpeg',
      desc: `Chapatti, fried spinach, 2 Sausages, 2 eggs served with Home fries and Baked Beans. `,
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: 'FRIED CRISPY CHICKEN WINGS',
      category: 'lunch',
      price:33500,
      img: './images/item-2.jpeg',
      desc: `Marinated chicken wings covered with bread crumbs and deep fried, served with carrots and dipping sauce `,
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: 'OREO MILKSHAKE',
      category: 'shakes',
      price:17500,
      img: './images/item-3.jpeg',
      desc: `Blend of premium vanilla ice cream, milk & oreo cookies.`,
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      title: 'CHICKEN & EGG WRAP COMBO',
      category: 'breakfast',
      price:31000,
      img: './images/item-4.jpeg',
      desc: `Grilled chicken, farm fresh eggs, avocado, cheese and fresh tomato served in a home-made tortilla served with a fruit bowl, salsa and home fries. `,
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      title: 'CARIBBEAN JERK CHICKEN',
      category: 'lunch',
      price: 41000,
      img: './images/item-5.jpeg',
      desc: `Marinated chicken on bone Caribbean style, grilled to perfection, served with salsa, plantains, salad, 1000 island dressing and ranchero sauce. With your choice of fries or rice or mashed potatoes.`,
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      title: 'STRAWBERRY MILKSHAKE',
      category: 'shakes',
      price:16500,
      img: './images/item-6.jpeg',
      desc: `Strawberry Milkshake`,
    },
    
    {
        id: 1,
        title: '',
        category: 'drinks',
        price: 12000,
        img: '',
        desc: `Your favourite Dawa teas served in ice`,
      },
    {
      id: 7,
      title: 'GRILLED CHICKEN & EGGS',
      category: 'breakfast',
      price:31000,
      img: './images/item-7.jpeg',
      desc: `Grilled chicken breasts, two farm fresh eggs served with golden brown home fries and toast.`,
    },
    {
      id: 8,
      title: 'american classic',
      category: 'lunch',
      price: 12.99,
      img: './images/item-8.jpeg',
      desc: `on it tumblr kickstarter thundercats migas everyday carry squid palo santo leggings. Food truck truffaut  `,
    },
    {
      id: 9,
      title: 'BLUEBERRY MILKSHAKE',
      category: 'shakes',
      price: 17000,
      img: './images/item-9.jpeg',
      desc: `A blend of premium vanilla ice cream, milk & Blueberries.`,
    },
    {
        id: 10,
        title: ' FIT BREAKFAST',
        category: 'breakfast',
        price:31000,
        img: './images/item-7.jpeg',
        desc: `Grilled Chicken breast, Avocado, Poached eggs, steamed spinach and roasted plantain & Toast`,
      },
      {
        id: 11,
        title: 'BREAKFAST PANCAKE SAMPLER',
        category: 'breakfast',
        price:31000,
        img: './images/item-7.jpeg',
        desc: `2 signature pancakes, two farm fresh eggs, two sausages, baked beans and golden home fries.`,
      },

      {
        id: 1,
        title: 'ICED DAWA TEAS',
        category: 'drinks',
        price: 12000,
        img: '',
        desc: `Your favourite Dawa teas served in ice`,
      },
  ];
  export default menu;
